name: Trinket Tinker
description:
Trinket Tinker is an easy-to-use jewelry design tool.  Drag and drop to create and simple or complex beads, with control over color, size, rotation, and layer order.   Clone your beads to quickly fill the stage and you're ready to play!  Plan your design on one of the included necklace, ring, or earring templates, which can be swapped out at any time to  easily create matching sets.  Or, use a blank template or grid for pattern creation, or anything else you can imagine.  When your masterpiece is complete, the built-in screenshot function saves your design  to your device as a .PNG file for viewing and sharing.

Features:

  • 7 templates for a quick start to your layout
  • 5 bead types -- stack to create custom beads
  • Color palette with 18 25 colors, plus color picker for custom colors
  • Bead transparency for creating see-through effects
  • Zoom and pan functions aid in creating intricate or complex designs
  • On-screen display shows your current bead count and the exact RGBA color code to help transition your design to the real world
  • Built-in Gallery lets you view and delete your saved designs without leaving the app

Your imagination is the limit with Trinket Tinker -- so get tinkering!

Available for Android and Windows.
